```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.path = "../../man/figures/pages-get-session-",

  error = TRUE,

  # see note in README or error/purl settings

knitr::knit_hooks$set(inline = function(x) {
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    x
  } else if (x >= 10000) {
    prettyNum(round(x, 2), big.mark = ",")
  } else {
    prettyNum(round(x, 2))
  }
})
kable_no_header <- function(x, font_size) {
  kable_in <- knitr::kable(x, "html", col.names = NULL)
  kableExtra::kable_styling(kable_input = kable_in, 
                            font_size = font_size)
}
```

For the interested reader, we provide a summary of the most recent session information.  

```{r echo = FALSE}
library("midfieldr")
library("midfielddata")

x <- sessioninfo::session_info()
x$packages$library <- NULL
x
```
